name: Dear Edwin
description:
Dear Edwin is a PSX style demake of Dear Esther, created for the 2018 Demake Jam.

This turned out to be a lot more difficult than I imagined it would be. Didn't get as much done as I would've liked, and I was working until the last second to get this done, so please forgive the lack of audio and any potential glitches.

Controls:
Mouse and keyboard only.
WSAD to move, mouse to look.
Click to read letters.
Escape to put down letter, pause game/read credits, and quit.

Update v1b: Turns out there were some last minute problems that broke most of the game. Hopefully those are fixed now.

Update v1c: A little cleanup. Removed the example textures that came with dsoft20's shaders, and fixed the credits screen (I previously forgot a couple of names and included a couple of incorrect ones, not to mention there were also some typos).
